import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // import "../boosted/css/boosted.min.css"; function IssuerHome() { const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); // window.location.reload(); return (

Login To Use Soverify solution

Welcome { sessionStorage.getItem(username)} To Soverify Solution

Generate Stores' Login Credentials

As a first step, you need to generate login credentials for the registered franchise stores.

Generate Credentials
Send Invitations

The second step is to send a pairwise connection invitation yo the stores, to securely exchange data.

Send Invitation
Verify Your Branch

Last step is to legitimize the store by issuing a Verifiable Credential.

Issue Credential
); } export default IssuerHome;
